sentences.en: All history was a palimpsest, scraped clean and reinscribed as often as was necessary.
sentences.cn: 全部历史都象一张不断刮干净重写的羊皮纸.

sentences.en: All history was a palimpsest, scraped clean and reinscribed exactly as often as was necessary.
sentences.cn: 历史变成了一张羊皮纸,可以按照需要擦净重写.

sentences.en: Some of it is lost, as the DNA palimpsest has been erased and re - written.
sentences.cn: 由于DNA的“原手稿本”已经擦拭并重写, 有些信息便遗失了.

sentences.en: Some of it is lost, as the DNA palimpsest has been erased and re-written.
sentences.cn: 它们的一些已经丢失了，因为一些DNA手稿已经被擦去重写。

trans.tran_en: a manuscript on which two or more successive texts have been written, each one being erased to make room for the next
